title: ITC to acquire organic FMCG staples brand 24 Mantra Organic for ₹472.5 crore
summary: ITC Limited has announced its acquisition of 24 Mantra Organic, an organic FMCG staples brand, for ₹472.5 crore, marking a significant move in the organic food sector.
content:
ITC Limited, one of India's leading conglomerates, has entered into an agreement to acquire 24 Mantra Organic, a prominent organic food brand, for ₹472.5 crore. The acquisition marks ITC's strategic entry into the growing organic food segment in India.

The deal will help ITC expand its presence in the organic FMCG staples category, which has been seeing increasing consumer demand for chemical-free and naturally produced food products.
